request: Fix all SafeSteps deployment and compatibility issues

deployment_sync_failure.description: Streamlit Cloud running outdated code despite git commits
deployment_sync_failure.impact: Template management completely broken for users

pymupdf_compatibility.description: PyMuPDF version mismatch causing align parameter errors

auth_credential_mismatch.description: Different passwords on cloud vs documentation

ui_rendering_issues.description: Progress bars showing raw HTML instead of visual components

uncommitted_changes.description: Modified files not committed to git

pinecone_queries.global_knowledge: Found patterns for deployment sync failures and API migrations

execution_plan.phase3: Documentation - Update all docs with correct information
